title: Torrent Power receives LoI for 1,500 MW from MSEDCL for pump hydro storage
description: Torrent Power Limited has received a Letter of Intent from Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Co. Limited for a 1,500 MW/12,000 MWh pumped hydro storage project in Raigad District. The project will provide energy storage capacity for 40 years, with the detailed award pending approval from the Maharashtra Electricity Regulatory Commission.
